text:
Squirro | Frontend (Backbone, ES6), Python | Onsite, EU passports only | Zurich | Salary: 100k-120k CHF

We build a Python- / Elasticsearch-based solution that helps enterprises to finds lost or broken data and fix it. We have just raised a very successful round with a US-investor (we might become the next Swiss unicorn) and we look for frontend (user-facing stuff, dashboards, visualizations) and backend engineers (core search product) to join in our Zurich office.

Interview:

1) Phone screen

2) 2h home-work

3) Onsite with the team, no whiteboarding

Email us:

jobs@squirro.tech
